title: The Chinese bungalow
creator_credit: George King and British Lion Film Corp
brief_description: Based on the Matheson Lang and Marion Osmond stage drama about a Chinese merchant who plots to kill the lover of his English wife. Stars Paul Lukas, Jane Baxter, Robert Douglas, Kay Walsh, Wallace Douglas, Jerry Verno. Photography by Hone Glendinning. Music by Jack Beaver. Edited by Jack Harris. Art direction by Philip Bawcombe.
